about.storyPart1: Founded in 2010, Sacred Journeys began with a simple yet profound mission: to connect people with the world's most spiritually significant places. Our founder, Sarah Johnson, was inspired by her own transformative experiences at various religious sites around the globe.
about.storyPart2: What started as a small operation offering guided tours to local pilgrimage sites has now grown into a respected name in religious tourism, serving thousands of spiritual seekers each year.
about.quote1: Embark on a journey of spiritual discovery and cultural immersion with Sacred Journeys.
about.quote2: Experience the profound beauty and spiritual significance of sacred sites around the world.

service.title: Service
service.subtitle: Our Services We Provide
service.description: Explore diverse religious landmarks and spiritual experiences, showcasing rich cultural heritage and traditions. Visit sacred temples, historic churches, and peaceful monasteries, each holding stories of ancient rituals and deep devotion. Experience local festivals and spiritual practices that bring communities together, offering a unique glimpse into humanity's shared journey of faith and connection.

uniqueApproach.title: Our Unique Approach to Religious Tourism
uniqueApproach.subtitle: Blending Tradition with Innovation

items.item1: Preserve and promote authentic spiritual experiences

items.item3: Foster interfaith dialogue and mutual respect
items.item4: Prioritize sustainable and responsible tourism practices
items.item5: Provide comprehensive support before, during, and after your journey

KibehoHolyLand.name: Kibeho Holy Land
KibehoHolyLand.description: Known for the Marian apparitions of Our Lady of Kibeho, this is the only Vatican-approved apparition site in Africa.
KibehoHolyLand.significance: Major Catholic pilgrimage site where the Virgin Mary appeared to three young women in the 1980s

ReginaPacisCathedral.name: Regina Pacis Cathedral
ReginaPacisCathedral.description: The main Catholic cathedral in Kigali, showcasing modern African Christian architecture.
ReginaPacisCathedral.significance: Center of Catholic worship in Rwanda's capital

NyakibandaSeminary.name: Nyakibanda Seminary
NyakibandaSeminary.description: One of the oldest and largest seminaries in Rwanda, training priests since 1936.
NyakibandaSeminary.significance: Historical center for religious education and formation

WesternWall.name: Western Wall
WesternWall.description: The most sacred site in Judaism, part of the ancient Temple Mount complex.
WesternWall.significance: Last remaining wall of the Second Temple of Jerusalem

ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.name: Church of the Holy Sepulchre
ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.description: Traditional site of Jesus's crucifixion, burial, and resurrection.
ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.significance: Most important pilgrimage site for many Christian denominations

AlAqsaMosque.name: Al-Aqsa Mosque
AlAqsaMosque.description: The third-holiest site in Islam, located on the Temple Mount.

BahaiGardens.name: Bahá'í Gardens
BahaiGardens.description: Terraced gardens surrounding the Shrine of the Báb in Haifa.
BahaiGardens.significance: World Center of the Bahá'í Faith

SeaOfGalilee.name: Sea of Galilee
SeaOfGalilee.description: Freshwater lake associated with many events in Jesus's life.
SeaOfGalilee.significance: Important site for Christian pilgrims and nature lovers

GreatPyramidOfGiza.name: Great Pyramid of Giza
GreatPyramidOfGiza.description: One of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, built as a tomb for the Pharaoh Khufu.
GreatPyramidOfGiza.significance: Symbol of ancient Egyptian civilization and engineering marvel

LuxorTemple.name: Luxor Temple
LuxorTemple.description: A large Ancient Egyptian temple complex located on the east bank of the Nile River.
LuxorTemple.significance: Important site for ancient Egyptian religion and history

SaintCatherinesMonastery.name: Saint Catherine's Monastery
SaintCatherinesMonastery.description: One of the oldest working Christian monasteries in the world.
SaintCatherinesMonastery.significance: Important site for Orthodox Christianity and home to valuable manuscripts

HagiaSophia.name: Hagia Sophia
HagiaSophia.description: Former Greek Orthodox Christian patriarchal cathedral, later an Ottoman imperial mosque, now a museum.
HagiaSophia.significance: Architectural marvel and symbol of Istanbul's diverse history

Ephesus.name: Ephesus
Ephesus.description: An ancient Greek city on the coast of Ionia, famous for the Temple of Artemis.
Ephesus.significance: One of the best-preserved ancient cities in the Mediterranean

Cappadocia.name: Cappadocia
Cappadocia.description: A region known for its distinctive 'fairy chimneys,' formed by volcanic rock formations.
Cappadocia.significance: Unique landscape and early Christian history
